column5: Mr Villere Another business I like is a company called CY This is a bit smaller about a 55 billion market cap They really fly under the radar They trade at about 14 times earnings Competitors trade at about 20 times earningsThese guys have a leading position in the internet of things And it is also a great play on the increasing volumes of electrical vehicles About 25 of their revenue right now is internet of things Its growing quite rapidly over 40 in 2018Basically the internet of things gives you the ability to be connected For instance when your alarm goes off in the morning your coffee maker starts and those types of thingsTo compare one of the pureplay internet of things companiesSLAB derives about 60 of their revenue from that area And they trade at about a 27 multiple So we think theres plenty of room for Cypress to get their multiple expanded over time as they get more credit for that businesstwstcomnewsneworleansfShow More
